Entries.default: "Huh. Wonder what the folk back at the Dyrford mill would pay for something like that."
"It appears the Huana could enchant items to command the water as well. Interesting."
"We will make a watershaper of you yet!"
"See, fish boy? It isn't so hard."
"Well dang, Watcher, we won't hardly get our feet wet! Bet you Saewyn would love one of them!"
"Ha! Right clever, that! Might be we can use these in charting our course through this place."
"With that relic, we should be able to navigate these waterways. I wonder how it works..."
"You altered the flow. Did you, eh, did you mean to?"
"Just try not to drown us while you play with forces you do not understand."
